Title: Small Things
Description:
We had some well-meaning whelps take a few teeny objects from history. Small things can sometimes have a big impact. While the whelps are doing double chores, I need someone to return these rocks to their proper place.

I know, right? Rocks? But they have to go back.
ObjectivesText: Return the Icy Rocks to Lordaeron.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Chromie in Eon's Fringe.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal from Everywhen Inn to Lordaeron
Take the portal from Lordaeron to Everywhen Inn
Return to Chromie in Everywhen Inn
